review:
I along with my Fianc√© went there - who was Suffering from Heel Pain.

Dr. Sanyal's way of Diagnosis was more of Explanatory to the patient and family. I really liked the way he explained us everything and Clarified many doubts patiently.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
He is really genuine and experienced doctor. He totally concentrate on healing the patient as much as he can and always motivates and asks you to look at the brighter side even when you are dealing with such a crippling disease called "Rheumatoid Arthritis" 

Thank you Doctor for being there.

I have coccydynia (Tailbone inflamation) and lower back pain, I visited Doc. and he only prescribed me a bunch of painkillers and physiotherapy, nothing more. He also suggested a physiotherapy machine which is banned since many years.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Soft spoken, human touch, right suggestions are the appreciable facts about Dr Sanyal. 
We are certainly satisfied with the treatment as because of this reason we have visited repeatedly to his clinic for treatment. We have often recommend him to our friends n relatives.
